Headline: 1. Tras acuerdo entre camioneros y Gobierno, así quedará el precio del ACPM en Colombia
Translation in English: [Translation in English: After an agreement between truck drivers and the Government, this is how the price of ACPM will be in Colombia]

Headline: 2. Se levanta el paro camionero: Gobierno y transportadores llegaron a un acuerdo en el aumento del precio del ACPM
Translation in English: [Translation in English: The truck strike is lifted: Government and transporters reached an agreement on the increase in the price of ACPM]

Headline: 3. Intento de hurto a carro de valores en el parque de Belén provocó balacera que dejó un herido
Translation in English: [Translation in English: Attempted robbery of an armored vehicle in Belén Park resulted in a shootout leaving one injured]

Headline: 4. Se levantan los bloqueos del paro camionero: Bogotá y Medellín reportan un regreso a la normalidad en sus vías
Translation in English: [Translation in English: Blockades of the truck strike lifted: Bogotá and Medellín report a return to normalcy on their roads]
